title: Manage H2S Gas Alert
description: A safety officer in a refinery receives an alert from a fixed H2S gas detector in a process unit.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the H2S gas alert and identify its exact location on the plant map.
tasks.expected_outcome: The location of the high H2S reading is pinpointed.

tasks.description: Trigger the area alarm horn and lights and send an emergency notification to all personnel in that unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: All personnel in the affected area are alerted to evacuate.

tasks.description: Log the incident in the safety management system and dispatch the emergency response team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The incident is officially logged, and the response team is on its way.
